content: *super fast crochet with a speed hook and three strands of yarn held together for a lush cuddly afghan lion brand yarn * skill level beginner level 1 cotton-ease® article #830 3 colors 2 balls each 6 balls total crochet hook - size s-35 speed hook 19 mm gauge 6 single_crochet = 4 in \ 10 cm 6 row = 3½ in \ 9 cm with 1 strand each of a b and c held together *due to the nature of the fabric when working with a speed hook gauge may vary throughout * work in single_crochet u s with 1 strand each of a b and c held together throughout available in different colorways 60509a speed hook baby blanket 1 2005 published in lion brand yarn catalog - 2006 w *snow lake lime* 60510a speed hook baby blanket 2 2005 published in lion brand yarn catalog - 2006 w *snow berry terracotta* previously available on michaels com as *gorgeous green crochet baby blanket e06355* 1 http //www lionbrand com/patterns/60509a html 2 http //www lionbrand com/patterns/60510a html
